report.title: Squares User Has Entered Data For
report.description: Return a list of NPMS Squares users has previously entered data for.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites square_w on square_w.location_id=square.id AND square_w.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id=square.id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN samples samp on samp.location_id = plot.id AND samp.survey_id in (#limit_survey_ids#) AND samp.deleted = false WHERE square.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND samp.created_by_id=#the_user_id# AND samp.date_start >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_sample_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) AND square.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_square_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date)

param.name: ignore_sample_dates_before
param.description: Ignore samples whose date is before this date (we can ignore previous years data).

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: limit_survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

param.name: square_admin_page_link
param.description: Link to page which administrators use to manage squares.
